FEATURE_ISOMORPHIC_DESC: Catberry builds browser script bundle with browserify and re-uses your node.js modules in browser
FEATURE_SPA_DESC: Automatically creates Single Page Application using browser History API
FEATURE_SEO_DESC: Back-end renders identical page for search engines and shared links
FEATURE_FAST_DESC: Super fast rendering engine using node.js Streams API without in-memory template rendering
FEATURE_EASY_DESC: All framework is built using Service Locator pattern, Dependency Injection and Promises
FEATURE_READY_DESC: Well-tested and already used in several public deployed applications
